name: Terminus: Survival
detailed_description:
Terminus: Survival is an online multiplayer open-world survival shooter. The goal is to survive against the environment, hostile AI and other players. Explore the world, mine resources, craft equipment and create a settlement

FEATURES

PVP - Terminus: Survival currently features 17 different weapons with various attachments. Many more weapons and attachments are planned for future updates

Customize - Our weapons modding system allows you to fully mod weapons with multiple attachments, scopes and gun parts.

BUILD - Create a base to store all your valuable loot

RAID - Demolish and break into your enemies’ bases. Take your claim and expand your territory

CRAFT - Collect components and find blueprint recipes to craft tools and weapons

Disclaimer:

I am currently the sole developer of this project. With your support during Early Access I can add needed programmers and artist to the dev team. There may be bugs, performance problems and game-play issues. The game also may change completely over the course of Early Access. This version is not a representation of a final product. Please take this into consideration.

Join our discord:

https://discord.gg/SynteN8

short_description: Terminus: Survival is a sandbox survival game set in the depths of space. Explore, build a base and survive against the hostile environment.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7+ 64bit or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6500 or similar
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 960 4GB/ R9 380
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 8.1 64-bit or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4770K or similar
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 6GB/ RX 580
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
